about_the_game:
Where The Clouds End is an atmospheric single-player first-person game about journey to the edge of the world

Features

  • Your route takes place through the beautiful canyon and the ancient archaeological complex.* The best hotels with the lowest rates guaranteed.
  • Already packed up, asked your boss, said goodbye to your family, but don’t know how to get into this paradise of the world? Oh, it’s easy, just follow the passing clouds. You can use the services of our stagecoaches.**
  • Locations full of dangerous environment for lovers of exotic and extreme sports. A medical certificate and vaccinations are required.
  • Many secrets and discoveries, as well as souvenir shops at the edge of the world.

* - A memory photo is included in the price of the trip.
** - Additional charges may apply.

name: Where The Clouds End

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-2400, AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550Ti or AMD Radeon HD 7750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
